articles.content: As has become tradition, the next batch of free games for PlayStation Plus subscribers has leaked early (via Dealabs). The user known as billbil-kun has been spot on with PS Plus leaks for nearly a y… [+2748 chars]

articles.title: Tesla CarPlay workaround now supports browsers in each model - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Currently, Tesla cars do not support CarPlay, but by the beginning of the year, 9to5Mac reported a nice project called Tesla Android with CarPlay. Created by developer Michał Gapiński, this workaround to enable CarPlay on Tesla cars has now been updated to ve…

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Fortnite creators are making studios to build ambitious — and branded — worlds - The Verge
articles.description: There are a growing number of groups forming full-time studios to create branded Fortnite Creative worlds. And it seems like we’re only in the early days of what might be possible.
articles.content:
Fortnite Creative is opening up opportunities
Illustration by Jarett Sitter / The Verge
Last year, Fortnite developer Epic Games launched a big partnership with high fashion house Balenciaga. In ad… [+6871 chars]
